abilities.description: You were trained in several languages and dialects found throughout the Forge. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.bd6278f18bbd6739]{Ask the Oracle} if you know a specific language or dialect you encounter, increase the likelihood by one step.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by taking significant time to decipher an unknown language or decrypt a language based cypher, add +2.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.9f538fabf8998c5b]{Compel} using figurative language or slang to strike emotional chords in a language not native to you, roll with advantage.
